alert.note: Alert for Butts; Lamar; Monroe; Pike; Spalding; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Spalding, eastern Pike, northwestern Monroe, northeastern Upson, southwestern Butts and Lamar Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Milner, or near Barnesville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Griffin, Barnesville, Zebulon, Milner, Yatesville, Orchard Hill, Meansville, Aldora, East Griffin, The Rock, Goggins, Chappel Mill, High Falls State Park, Redbone, Blount, Liberty Hill, Collier, Piedmont and Johnstonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Lamar; Monroe; Pike; Spalding; Upson
